name: of base
description:
This is 'of base', a new video game from Outhouse Media. It's a self-described '4D' space exploration game in which you travel through space by falling through time.
The game, 'Castle' (via PlayStation Blog), is set to release on March 22nd. A press release for the game has been released, and it describes the game as follows: · The game takes place in a time when warships and space stations were destroyed and humanity is plunged into a new era of massive space exploration, and you play as a professional ship pilot who transfers to a new station into this new time period. · Flying in a starship and outfitting yourself with a wide variety of space-based equipment, you must navigate through the most dangerous areas of the galaxy from the depths of the Milky Way towards the stars. · New locations and new technologies to explore can only be created when you travel through the galaxy with a diverse crew of explorers. · Space lakes and space stations are the most dangerous places in the galaxy. You must stay on board these where they are the most dangerous. · Upon leaving a space station, you will become a rat in this new universe, an animal who travels between the worlds and is constantly hunted down and eliminated. · Easy to learn and difficult to master, 'Castle' will have you making history in no time! "Castle" is being developed by a team of over 25, including the 3D artist who contributed to the
